QuestData.Title: War Forage
QuestData.Description: <Griff's stomach growls.>$B$BWhenever we Dragonmaw go on the warpath, everyone stops hunting.$B$BThe best tasting food is stolen from the mouths of the enemy. Up on the ridge north of the river there's a bunch of wrecked Wildhammer houses. I bet they're loaded with food.$B$BBring some to my mouth.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather 10 Wildhammer Food Stores from the Thundermar Ruins.
QuestData.RewardText: <Griff greedily snatches the heap of food, enough to feed dozens of men.>$B$BGreat! Did you get any for yourself?
